title: AlarmingCall (Enum)
text:
TYPE AlarmingCall :
The different ways, a module call after an alarm was
issued can be done to a module instance and its parents or surrounding
module instances.

rows.Name: None
rows.Comment: No module instance call at all is issued

rows.Name: Own
rows.Comment: Only the alarm defining module instance itself is called

rows.Name: Parents
rows.Comment:
The parent instances of the alarm defining module instance
are called.

rows.Name: All
rows.Comment:
Call all module instances available under the current
application
